original_text: Now when the virgins were gathered together the second time, Mordecai was sitting at the king's gate.
korean_text: 처녀들을 다시 모을 때에는 모르드개가 대궐 문에 앉았더라

sentences.original_text: Now when the virgins were gathered together the second time,
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 처녀들이 두 번째로 모였을 때,

sentences.original_text: Mordecai was sitting at the king's gate.
sentences.korean_translation: 모르드개는 왕의 문 앞에 앉아 있었다.
